post.body: Hehe. What is there I can skeptically BS about on NYE? The significance of the number 2009? Something astrological?
Oh, it's not too close a mate. Remember at the protest how many people were wearing the same xkcd shirt? It's not that one...
I don't think we'd both fit in it at the same time...
I just hate it when FAIL is used in cases of unambiguous win. Case in point: http://is.gd/cjUt
Aren't moral issues real issues, and vice versa? Look forward to the blog, I know I still owe you a comment on religion...
I nicked the joke from that motivator, of course, Aphex Twin isn't really the sauce.
Yes. I can read music. That is by Aphex Twin.
Re: 'in my mailbox'... does 'serious writing' mean we get Pharyngula: The Book?
Yeah, you too! I'm normally much more social, but I was verrrrry tiiiirrrreeed last night! :-)
et al. Thank you for the lovely company. I had an ace time, though I was very tired and not bouncing like Tigger for a change.
It's crap. ;-)
Wonders who invented lime flavour crisps.
Likes a bit of science, he does.
Might change his mind and pop into Sweeneys.
is not going for a beer. He is going to get working on his blog. 01/01/09 00:00:00
is tired but will soon be going for a beer with lovely company. So that's all right then.
Attn Twitter & FB: if a mate has a geek t-shirt you really dig, are you allowed to buy the same one?
Feels refreshed.
Is not at Kelly's.
Is at Kelly's.
